comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 826
formula: E.g.f.: log(-1/(-1+x*exp(x)-x))a(n) ~ (n-1)! * r^n, where r = 1.23997788765655... is the root of the equation log(1+r)=1/r. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 29 2013a(n) =  n!*Sum_{k=1..n/2}((k-1)!*stirling2(n-k,k)/(n-k)!). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Mar 22 2016
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name using e.g.f. by _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 30 2013
